wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth Parr is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1960s and 1970s. He played at representative level for Great Britain and England, and at club level for Rochdale Hornets and Warrington, as a second-row, i.e. number 11 or 12, during the era of contested scrums.
